# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_1222_son_1.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_1222_son_1.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_1222_son_2.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_1222_son_2.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1222_SON/bug_1222_son_1.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> bug_1222_son_1.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1222_SON/bug_1222_son_1.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;expression;bug1222son;bug1249son;required:klu;performance")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1222_SON/bug_1222_son_1.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP bug_1222_son_1.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1222_SON/bug_1222_son_1.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_1222_son_1.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1222_SON/bug_1222_son_1.cir.prn bug_1222_son_1.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1222_SON/bug_1222_son_1.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED bug_1222_son_1.cir)
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1222_SON/bug_1222_son_2.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> bug_1222_son_2.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1222_SON/bug_1222_son_2.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;expression;bug1222son;bug1249son;required:klu;performance")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1222_SON/bug_1222_son_2.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP bug_1222_son_2.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1222_SON/bug_1222_son_2.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_1222_son_2.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1222_SON/bug_1222_son_2.cir.prn bug_1222_son_2.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1222_SON/bug_1222_son_2.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED bug_1222_son_2.cir)
endif()
